Game is ok for those who can accept that many people use hacks like crazy despite VAC bans. Lots of toxic players who kick you because you missed a bullet, but they did not even get one kill XD . And sometimes you get kicked at the end because some groups farm for loot.

If you can get pass all that and find a group to enjoy with ( rare ) then this is the game for you. Otherwise get some CHILL pills... youll need them XD
